I just found out about an **AWESOME** program, I've been looking for something like this for months (aka doing nothing to actually find it).
[Taskwarrior](http://taskwarrior.org/projects/show/taskwarrior/) is a task management tool with a _REALLY_ cool command line interface.
It support projects, tags, dependencies and a lot of other cool stuff.
Now I won't forget things to do :)
I suggest getting version 1.9.4 from git, its zsh completion support makes it a breeze to use.

$ cat ~/.xkb/xkbevd.cf Bell() shell "/home/meh/bin/vbell"
$ cat ~/.xinitrc exec xkbevd -bg
